infoStepIntroDesc:
In this step you are guided through providing specific information about the complaint which assists the provider in addressing it in a timely manner. The provider is obliged to address your complaint within 30 days.

Once submitted, you will proceed to the next step where you engage with the provider to negotiate a resolution.
detailsStepIntroDesc: The details you provide in this step will help to give context to the problem and will greatly assist achiving a quick and useful resolution.
responderDetailsStepIntroDesc:
Below are the details provided by the client. Once they have provided all the required details, you will be able to engage in a conversation with them.

The details we collect aim to provide you with the background information to help you suggest an acceptable resolution.
conversationStepIntroDesc:
When engaging in the conversation:

  • Avoid blaming language
  • Focus on the problem instead of each other
  • Describe without judgment

When you agree on a resolution it will be recorded in the next step.
resolutionStepIntroDesc: The resolution can be recorded here (by the provider) and agreed to (by the client).
